question: I am a mother and have PCOS. My daughters are 10 & 7. I know there is a 50/50 chance of them developing PCOS and I was just wondering if there is any testing I could or should have done on them to detect PCOS. I know earlier detection and treatment can help possibly prevent complications of PCOS such as diabetes and heart disease, but I'm just not sure when and what tests to ask for.
title: Worried about daughters
